name: Go for a walk SIMULATOR
description:
Game made for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

PRESENTATION  is slightly better on downloadable version.

This is my first time trying a leaderboard so enjoy. 

Note: Leaderboard only works on downloadable version because itch.io is special.

The theme of the game jam is "Roll Of The Dice" , you can judge the compatibility to the theme for yourself.

Story:

You are the square man, square man is new to walking and finds it difficult due to his certain lack of knee caps and will stop at nothing to get onto the  50m walk global leaderboard to satisfy your primal instincts to assert your dominance over random people on the internet you have never even met before.
